attrFile.name: file
attrFile.comment: Filename of an EXR or TX format texture (must be mip-mapped and tiled with maketx). If filename contains '<UDIM>', udim index substitution is performed on filename.

attrSt.name: st
attrSt.label: st
attrSt.comment: Texture coordinate to use to fetch this texture.

attrWrapS.name: wrapS
attrWrapS.label: wrap s
attrWrapS.comment: Wrap mode when reading this texture.

attrWrapT.name: wrapT
attrWrapT.label: wrap t
attrWrapT.comment: Wrap mode when reading this texture.

attrFallback.name: fallback
attrFallback.label: fallback
attrFallback.comment: Fallback value used when texture can not be read.

attrScale.name: scale
attrScale.label: scale
attrScale.comment: Scale to be applied to all components of the texture.  output = textureValue * scale + bias

attrBias.name: bias
attrBias.label: bias
attrBias.comment: Bias to be applied to all components of the texture.  output = textureValue * scale + bias

attrSourceColorSpace.name: sourceColorSpace
attrSourceColorSpace.label: source color space
attrSourceColorSpace.comment: Flag indicating the color space in which the source texture is encoded.  If set to auto, gamma correction will be applied if the images is not single channel.

attrUDimValues.name: udim_values
attrUDimValues.label: udim values
attrUDimValues.comment: Explicit list of UDIM values corresponding to filename in the \"udim_files\" list

attrUDimFiles.name: udim_files
attrUDimFiles.label: udim files
attrUDimFiles.comment: Explicit list of UDIM filenames corresponding to values in the \"udim_values\" list

attrMaxVdim.name: udim_max_v
attrMaxVdim.label: udim max v
attrMaxVdim.comment: Maximum UDIM v value used (maximum UDIM row). Needed to for texture allocation.
